metadata.description: FREE FIRST ISSUE!  A geeky romantic comedy from the illustrator of MARRY ME!  Jess is a girl who loves comic books. That's not strange, there are lots of girls who love comics. But she may be the only girl in the world who opened up her very own comic book shop in order to get closer to the guy she likes! NO PINK PONIES is the story of a girl, a guy, and a comic book shop.
metadata.name: No Pink Ponies
